headlineTxt: Oct 04, 2021, 08:00 ETPixCell Medical Wins MedTech Visionaries Award 2021Portable, robust and user-friendly, HemoScreen leverages patented technologies such as a novel microfluidics method, Viscoelastic Focusing, AI-powered machine vision and an innovative Lab-On-A-Cartridge concept to More news about: PixCell Medical
